events.title: Take care of Grandpa for me.
events.description: Mayreel has come to see you. She flies into a rage on the spot and tells you to do something about Kamael. She says he's a complete pain in the neck. What may be the matter?

options.option: Tell her that you'll go see him.
options.response: You don't know what's going on but decide to go check it out. You head towards Kamael's office.

options.option: Tell her to do it herself.
options.response: Nothing good comes from getting involved with someone else's family issues. You go your own way ignoring Mayreel's clamor.

events.title: Foul-mouthed Kid
events.description: You entered Kamael's office. But there's only a kid and Kamael's nowhere to be seen. And the kid is blabbering things like Lousy? Are you annoyed? You don't know what he's talking about.

options.response: You start to get annoyed by the kid's foul language. Bad mannered children must be scolded. You give the kid's butt a good spanking.
The kid pushes you away. The kid looks at you with spite. You suddenly feel like dying.
notes: All Heroes take damage by 20% of their own max HP.

options.response: You realize the kid is Kamael. You presume something must have happened but it doesn't seem like you'll get an answer from the kid. You leave to go search for a way to bring Kamael back to normal.

events.title: Bari's Memory
events.description: You've met Bari. As a servant of Kamael, perhaps she'll know something.

options.response: For some reason Bari says she cant remember recent events. Instead she hands you Kamael's schedule thinking it may be of help.

events.title: Tracking whereabouts.
events.description: You check Kamael's schedule. The places Kamael recently visited are written in the schedule.

options.response: You head for the clothing shop.
You head for the herb shop.

response: Come to think of it, checking carefully from the first page seems like a good idea. You decide to rethink what you have to do.
There's something about a witch that grants wishes written on the back page. Something smells fishy. You decide to go search for the witch.
notes: Triggered after completing #[Investigate the clothing shop] and #[Investigate the herb shop]

events.title: Investigate the clothing shop
events.description: You've arrived at the clothing shop. The shopkeeper greets you with a bright smile.

options.response: The shopkeeper tells you Kamael recently bought several sets of women's apparel. Nothing seems particularly worth your attention. You leave the clothing shop.
notes: Unlocked from #[Tracking whereabouts.#Investigate the clothing shop]

events.title: Investigate the herb shop
events.description: You meet the apothecary. The apothecary gestures you to come in.

options.response: The apothecary tells you Kamael recently bought a bunch of memory-improving medicine. There's nothing special other than that. You leave the herb shop.
notes: Unlocked from #[Tracking whereabouts.#Investigate the herb shop]

events.title: A wish granting witch
events.description: You followed the schedule to search after the witch. She claims she'll grant you any wish if you give her the proper offering.

options.option: Ask to return Kamael back to his regular state.
options.response: The witch laughs and says your wish was granted. Some of your comrades seem to be missing, but it's probably just your imagination.
The witch laughs and says your wish was granted. Some of your comrades seem to be missing, but it's probably just your imagination.
The witch laughs and says your wish was granted. Some of your comrades seem to be missing, but it's probably just your imagination.

events.title: Returned Kamael
events.description: You returned to Kamael's office. The Harvest God family are all together. It seems Kamael returned to his normal state as well.

options.response: Bari, Mayreel and Kamael all thank you. Receiving expressions of gratitude from gods isn't so bad.
notes: Unlocks #[At the office] and #[What's your wish.]

events.title: At the office
events.description: You remembered how you didn't return the schedule. So you visited Kamael's office. But it seems no one is here right now.

options.response: You waited all day long, but nobody came. You reluctantly head back.
You're not supposed to, but that's why it's more fun. You find a Hard Cover Diary in the drawers.
You can't sit and wait all day long for someone who won't show. You decide to return on a later date.

events.title: What's your wish.
events.description: You're reunited with the witch. She asks what your wish is. She claims she can give you great power if you desire.

options.option: Enhance the God of Harvest's power.
options.response: The witch accepts the offering, and hands you an Artifact that enhances the God of Harvest's power.
The witch accepts the offering, and hands you an Artifact that enhances the Flower Girl's power.
The witch accepts the offering, and hands you an Artifact that enhances the Divine Beast's power.
You pay the offering to the witch, and obtain a powerful Artifact.
You're well aware of the kind of doom making a deal with the witch will bring. You start walking away.
